opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Viking Theatre Corp. v. Paramount Film Distributing Corp.

opinion:
378 U.S. 123

84 S.Ct. 1657

12 L.Ed.2d 743

VIKING THEATRE CORP.
v.
PARAMOUNT FILM DISTRIBUTING CORP. et al.

No. 481.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 15, 1964

Rehearing Denied Oct. 12, 1964.

See 85 S.Ct. 15.

Edward Bennett Williams, Washington, D. C., for petitioner.

Louis Nizer, New York City, and Morris Wolf, Philadelphia, for respondents.

On Writ of Certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit.

PER CURIAM.

1

The judgment is affirmed by an equally divided Court.

2

Mr. Justice DOUGLAS took no part in the decision of this case.
